Connect with Son Email: T.S.Hoang@soton.ac.uk Tel: +44 23 8059 7084 Google Scholar ORCID LinkedIn On this page About Research Publications Teaching Biography About Research Publications Teaching Biography About Dr Son Hoang is a Lecturer in the Cyber-Physical Systems Group (a part of School of Electronics and Computer Science). He was awarded a first class honours degree in Computer Engineering from the University of New South Wales (UNSW), Sydney, Australia in 2001.  Subsequently, he studied for a PhD (also at UNSW) and was awarded his PhD in 2006 for his thesis on "The Development of a Probabilistic B-Method and a Supporting Toolkit". Research Research groups Member of: Cyber Physical Systems Centre for Internet of Things and Pervasive Systems Centre for Robotics Research interests Formal System Development Program Semantics
